txt.en: 'Thank you, [placeholder].\n\n'I know many of my men desire rest after our siege of Pelargir, but that time cannot come until this war is at an end.'
Angbor can be found by the eastern gate of Pelargir.\n\nYou have rallied many of Angbor's men and should now return to Angbor.
You have gone too far from Angbor's men!
A group of Angbor's men stands nearby
You have gone too far from Angbor's men!
A group of Angbor's men stands nearby
You have gone too far from Angbor's men!
A group of Angbor's men stands nearby
Angbor's men can be found throughout the eastern half of Pelargir.\n\nAngbor has asked you to rally his men in Pelargir before he sets out into Upper Lebennin.
Lord Angbor of Lamedon makes ready to travel through Upper Lebennin as he leads his host to Minas Tirith.

'We can tarry no longer, my friend.

'Aragorn has bid us travel to Minas Tirith across the plains of Upper Lebennin and Lossarnach, and I shall not abandon him in this crucial hour. However, my men have grown weary and many have not found rest since our defeat of the Corsairs.

'I know well the pain they feel, but they must press on through it, as have all of Gondor's great warriors. Go to them, and sound this horn that they might find themselves renewed.

'When you have done so, return to me, for our journey is just beginning!'
